amendment.description: To modify provisions relating to objectives, unused rate adjustment authority, transition rules, rate and service complaints, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2750 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2750 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S926-927; text: CR S926-927) To modify provisions relating to objectives, unused rate adjustment authority, transition rules, rate and service complaints, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2750 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Collins.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2750 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
